description: This file is an HTML webpage that provides a user interface for visualizing and managing database data. It includes styles, layout, and embedded JavaScript for loading database lists, tables, and data, as well as handling user interactions such as refresh, toggle database/table visibility, and expand cell content.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the server and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases, resets selections, and updates UI.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses database item to show/hide tables and loads tables when expanded.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables for the selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches data for the selected table and renders it as a table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML for displaying data table with columns and rows.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates HTML for individual cell content, handling nulls, objects, and long strings.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content to show full content or truncated view.
